valueProps.text: AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses

pains: Hefty penalties for late document updates
proof: Clients like Alpha Pro Partners, JRBCA, Legends Accounting

facts.text: Tax Star is an AI-powered Corporate Tax software.
facts.evidence: At its core is our AI-powered Corporate Tax software for UAE businesses.

facts.text: Tax Star offers E-Invoicing in the UAE.
facts.evidence: Alongside it, E-Invoicing in the UAE and Zakat in KSA complete the toolkit.

facts.text: Tax Star provides Zakat calculations for KSA.
facts.evidence: Zakat calculations built for KSA, designed to align smoothly with your overall compliance reporting.

facts.text: Tax Star offers automated returns and IFRS financial statements.
facts.evidence: Automated returns, IFRS financial statement, and smart reminders with Tax Star.

facts.text: Failure to update registration documents within 20 days of expiry results in a AED 5,000 penalty.
facts.evidence: Failure to update your registration documents within 20 days of expiry will result in hefty penalties.

facts.text: Tax Star notifies users of document expiry on a timely basis.
facts.evidence: Tax Star notifies you when they are due on a timely basis.

facts.text: Tax Star's primary CTA is 'Book a Demo'.
Tax Star's E-Invoicing ensures seamless integration with corporate tax filing.
facts.evidence: E-Invoicing that keeps your invoices FTA-compliant and ensures seamless integration with corporate tax filing.

facts.text: Tax Star is designed to simplify compliance needs.
facts.evidence: Find the right tool to simplify your compliance need today.

facts.text: All companies are required to prepare Financial Statements and submit with their tax return as per Corp tax law.
facts.evidence: As per Corp tax law, all companies are required to prepare Financial Statements and submit with their tax return.
